idea-plugin.name: Fields / Properties to Enumeration Generator
idea-plugin.description:
This plugin will generate an inner enumeration to reflect all available fields. Just use "ALT + INSERT" (or CMD-N depending on your shortcut settings) and select "Generate Property Enums"

  • This is related to the project moprhium [https://github.com/sboesebeck/morphium] the caching mongodb POJO Object Mapper. When querying mongodb, you usually need to define the field you are looking for as string - which kind of breaks the whole abstraction.

      • Author is Stephan Bösebeck (sboesebeck)

      special thanks to Daniel Merwin (Free Universe Games) who helped with previous versions
